page.title: 12SPORT & LEISURE - BARGOED
page.content: One hundred people put their activities in the following order of importance - T.V., Sport, Reading, Walking, Gardening and Dancing (76% put T.V. first. Sport is mainly concentrated at Heolddu Sports Centre, opened in 1974. Facilities include Badminton, Squash, a fitness room, Swimming, Tennis and an all-weather surface. Many courses are organised here - swimming, keep-fit and squash are most popular. Close by, the 18-hole golf course extends northwards overlooking the Darren Valley. The main park is pleasant and has a running track (used by the Rhymney Valley Athletic Club) and playing fields. The area supports an annual half-marathon which passes through the main street. There's a rugby club, a library, a nightclub and a dancehall.
